Motion: THP a tech industry characterized by multiple smaller firms rather than one dominated by a few large players (e.g. Google Amazon Facebook in status quo)

Info Slide: Surrogacy is an arrangement, often supported by a legal agreement, whereby a person agrees to bear a child in their womb for the duration of the pregnancy, for another person or persons, who will become the child's parent(s) after birth, in exchange for monetary compensation.
Motion: THR the rise of the commercialisation of surrogacy in developing countries
